definition: an act of gerrymandering, or dividing a voting area so as to give your own party an unfair advantage, divide unfairly and to one's advantage
details:
noun
- an act of gerrymandering, or dividing a voting area so as to give your own party an unfair advantage
= example: an act of gerrymandering, or dividing a voting area so as to give your own party an unfair advantage
verb
- divide unfairly and to one's advantage
